channel.title: Comments on: Meeting the Risen Christ at the Table?

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description: I'm not sure who said it dear Brother but I believe it with all my soul. I never take the Lords Supper without knowing a felt sense of His sweet presence. It is a means of grace on steroids! GBU!
item.content:encoded: I’m not sure who said it dear Brother but I believe it with all my soul. I never take the Lords Supper without knowing a felt sense of His sweet presence. It is a means of grace on steroids! GBU!
